automation_yaml:
id: 'morning_lights_office_wled_50_living_room_30'
alias: Morning Lights - Office WLED 50 and Living Room 30
description: "At 6:00 AM every day, turn on the Office WLED at 50% brightness and the Living Room light at 30% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '06:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 50
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 30
